Summary: Cigar Shaped Object seen in Laingsburg, Michigan
trends: There has been one other sighting in Laingsburg
There were no other sightings in Laingsburg on or around August 10th 1985
divs: Sighting Details1) Witness states that she was sitting in her sisters backyard2) I always look at planes-this one shone quite brightly3) I thought it was a jet.4) I watched it from horizon to horizon. When it was right above me, icommented on it to my niece who was sitting next to me. I kept watching untilit disappeared to the south. I thought it was strange that I didnt see anywings.5) It was cigar shaped, very shiny. It just glided along. There was no enginenoise. It went from north to south, horizon to horizon.Witness checked these object characteristics on Form 1 - cast light, reflectlight, appear solid, have outline.
